Although much of your work is misdirection and showmanship, your cons have inadvertently awakened a genuine awareness of magic in your mind. This new sense is both thrilling and frightening, and you hope that you can hone it further in the Circus of Wayward Wonders.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Arcana skill and the Scam Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.blMeVamjGz4ODWxq]{Arcane Sense} skill feat.

Mystic Tutor.name: 神秘导师 Mystic Tutor
Mystic Tutor.description:
你花费数年时间来预测、辨识和利用你与生俱来的魔法天赋。对于一个魔法充盈的世界来说，当你周围的每个人都具有施法能力时，你再怎么训练自己也不为过。

选择两项属性提升，一项必须为智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在内在魔法根源为奥术或异能。根据你选择的根源，你的奥法或神秘技能、以及学术学识（Academia Lore）受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{认知法术 Recognize Spell}技能专长。

Necromancer's Apprentice.name: 死灵法师学徒 Necromancer's Apprentice
Necromancer's Apprentice.description:
你在一个死灵法师手下当学徒。学徒生涯很是艰难，在这种地方你正解剖的尸体有可能突然活化，而每个魔法制品看起来都相当要命。现在就你自己而言，你很感谢自己当初学会了如何快速而完全地辨别魔法威胁。

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是体质或智力，另一项为自选属性加成。

你在奥秘和死灵学识（Necromancy Loreskill）上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IlOQuCQIhjJpig3S]{快速辨识 Quick Identification}技能专长。

Newcomer In Need.name: 走投无路 Newcomer In Need
Newcomer In Need.description:
你是一个走投无路的过峡人（Gokan），需要一件价值连城的奇珍来帮助你摆脱困境。奇珍很稀有，但赤凰冠军将能获得一件。也许你需要这笔钱来支付亲戚昂贵的手术费用，或者让你的家人摆脱黄金联盟（Golden League）黑帮的债务。或者在郝金的宝库里能找到一件能救你命的特别奖励——比如一件能让你逃到多元宇宙最遥远角落的护符，甚至可能存在某种能让你涅槃重生的神器，就像赤凰（Ruby Phoenix）本人那样。你生活在过峡最为困苦的城区——例如工业化的老城区（Oldtown）、龙鳞区（Scales）的贫民窟甚至是犯罪猖獗的地下城区里。艰难的成长环境教会了你自力更生，以及在不太可能的情况下迅速交到朋友。你已经凑出一支能够进入赤凰武道大会预选赛并且你足够信任的队伍。剩下还需要做的事就是完成这个看似不可能能任务，彻底赢得比赛。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或敏捷，另一项为自选属性提升。

你的社群和过峡学识（Goka Lore）技能受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.X2jGFfLU5qI5XVot]{人情练达 Streetwise}技能专长作为奖励。

Nexian Mystic.name: Nexian Mystic
Nexian Mystic.description:
Prerequisite Region - Impossible Lands

Your initiations into the Nexian mysteries and the philosophies of the Arclords of Nex grant you a preternatural comprehension of the arcane underpinnings of existence.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Arcana skill and a Lore skill related to one plane of your choice (other than the Material Plane). You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.blMeVamjGz4ODWxq]{Arcane Sense} skill feat.

Night Watch.name: 守夜人 Night Watch
Night Watch.description:
在他人安眠之时，你保持着戒备。你可能曾经是某个拥挤大都市的警队成员，可能是某个特殊墓地的守卫，或只是一个孤独无依的牧羊人。不知多少个夜晚，你冲着黑暗大声喊叫，不知道在你灯笼之外潜伏着的到底是什么。你不止一次在黑暗中看到不应该存在的东西蹒跚而过。

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是力量或魅力，另一项为自选属性加成。

你在威吓上受训，并在法律学识（Legal Lore）和你家乡的地区学识中选一个受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ar2DUlvDK4LDcH9J]{迅速胁迫 Quick Coercion}技能专长。

Nirmathi Guerrilla.name: Nirmathi Guerrilla
Nirmathi Guerrilla.description:
Prerequisite Region - Eye of Dread

Woodcraft comes naturally to you, and you have learned how to use the forest to your tactical advantage against superior forces in skirmishes against the Molthuni army or the Ironfang Legion.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Stealth skill and the Forest Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.beyw5bdA5hkQbmaG]{Terrain Stalker} (underbrush) skill feat.

Northland Forager.name: Northland Forager
Northland Forager.description:
The vast tundra and looming mountains of the Realm of the Mammoth Lords may seem featureless and barren to the untrained eye, but you know better. You see what others don't: nutritious roots buried beneath muddy reeds, succulent bird eggs cradled in craggy rocks, restorative berries nestled among thorny thickets, and more. In the south, farmers toil in dusty fields to eat the same vegetables every day, but your diet is varied and you're rarely hungry-the entire Realm is your garden.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Survival skill and the Herbalism Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager} skill feat.

Oenopion-Ooze Tender.name: Oenopion-Ooze Tender
Oenopion-Ooze Tender.description:
Prerequisite Region - Impossible Lands

Your apprenticeship in one of Oenopion's unorthodox arcane and alchemical academies instilled in you a deep reservoir of mostly reliable esoteric knowledge, not to mention a deep resentment born of countless hours spent mucking ooze pens and feeding helpless creatures to ravenous, belching jellies and gelatinous puddings.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Crafting skill and the Ooze Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Dubious Knowledge} skill feat.

Once Bitten.name: Once Bitten
Once Bitten.description:
After an altercation with an undead creature, you feared you might be infected. Either through medical intervention, luck, or misunderstanding how undeath spreads, your fears abated. However, your brush with living death taught you the value of life. You do whatever you can to avoid the end you thought you'd been fated.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是Dexterity或感知，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in the Medicine skill and the Undead Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine} skill feat.

Onyx Trader.name: Onyx Trader
Onyx Trader.description:
Prerequisite Region - Eye of Dread

Oprak doesn't share the secrets of the Onyx Vault with many, but you are one of the lucky few to be permitted into the heart of the nation. You have traveled the extradimensional paths of the Stone Roads and traded goods across a wide variety of lands. You've learned to step lively in foreign markets of all types.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Society skill and the Mercantile Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P9HCz0uR6xPHuw72]{Multilingual} skill feat.

Osirionologist.name: Osirionologist
Osirionologist.description:
Prerequisite Region - Golden Road

Whether you're a fascinated outsider or a local proud of your nation's storied past, you're a devoted student of Osirion's history. You might be a traveling professor, a member of a society like the Pathfinders or the Esoteric Order of the Palatine Eye, or even a simple tomb robber cashing in on the glories of the past.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Occultism skill and the Ancient Osirion Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hDGosy2ZTwnyctEP]{Oddity Identification} skill feat.

Otherworldly Mission.name: 使命召唤 Otherworldly Mission
Otherworldly Mission.description:
你的神告诉你，你要为一个特定的使命而服务，而这千真万确。也许你在成长过程中一直都知道，或者有一天它就那么出现在你的感知中，其声音如钟鸣般清晰，甚至更加响亮。有一些只有你才能完成的任务。你的任务可能像杀死一个致命的暴君一样危险，也可能像在在特定的某天打开特定的某扇门那样简单。Y你应该和GM一起决定如何处理你角色背景故事的真相，或者松开手，让GM秘密决定。这种使命召唤的信息到底是是来自角色的自我意识？还是被某种超自然的实体所操纵？或者真的是设定里的某位神祇对角色发出了行动的命令？

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是感知或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在宗教技能上受训。每次冒险一次，你可以向你相信是神明的声音请求命令，并得到某种指示——你不会得到任何解释，只是一个去某地或做某事的命令。遵循这些命令并不总是安全的，但通常很有趣。

Ozem Experience.name: Ozem Experience
Ozem Experience.description:
You or someone close to you worked with the Knights of Ozem before Lastwall fell. In addition to knowledge of the organization's tenets and goals, you have germane understanding of the order's history. You believe there are valuable lessons in the Knights of Ozem's exploits.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是力量或智力，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in the Society skill and the Warfare Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JtjnFsOToBLnSRO9]{Courtly Graces} skill feat.

Pathfinder Hopeful.name: Pathfinder Hopeful
Pathfinder Hopeful.description:
Prerequisite Region - Absalom and Starstone Isle

You've long wanted to join the adventurous Pathfinder Society. You have taken up the dangerous life of an adventurer in hopes of earning a spot among the Pathfinders.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Society skill and the Pathfinder Society Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} skill feat.

Pathfinder Recruiter.name: Pathfinder Recruiter
Pathfinder Recruiter.description:
The Pathfinder Society's always on the lookout for talent, but that talent rarely just stumbles into the Grand Lodge. Whether you're professionally trained to encourage new recruits or the Society's own scouts identified your potential and raised you from childhood, you're committed to expanding the Society's roster.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是感知或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Diplomacy skill and a Lore skill related to one city you've visited often. You gain the Group Impression skill feat.

Perfection Seeker.name: Perfection Seeker
Perfection Seeker.description:
Prerequisite Region - Impossible Lands

You aspire to perfect your body and mind in the tradition of Jalmeray's Houses of Perfection, honing your acrobatic skills and mental faculties in preparation for a lifetime pushing the edge of what most consider possible.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Acrobatics skill as well as the Warfare Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{Cat Fall} skill feat.

Pillar.name: Pillar
Pillar.description:
Not every Knight of Lastwall contributes to the crusade through combat. Pillars provide essential upkeep and service at camps, enjoying the same rank of knight as the crusaders and strategists for which the knights are known. You spent time as an assistant among the pillars, learning how noncombatants provide for the physical and mental wellbeing of an army.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是Intelligence或感知，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in one of your choice of the Medicine, Society, or Survival skills, as well as the Labor Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} skill feat.

Political Scion.name: Political Scion
Political Scion.description:
Like your parents and your parents before them, you initially followed the long path toward politics from an early age. Your close association with Absalom's upper echelons put you in touch with the city's various military or special operations units-the First Guard, the Wave Riders, the Varlokkur-though you avoided any actual duty with these groups. Thanks to your strict upbringing and the connections of your family, you soon became a lauded and highly respected member of Absalom's political elite. But you couldn't stifle a certain feeling that you were destined for more than simply filling the pointed shoes of your forebears. Despite your easily earned accolades and a relatively cushy life as a young lawyer or councilmember, you sought to do more with your diplomatic training and not live out the exact same life as your ancestors.

Your decision to transfer to the Edgewatch has rubbed your traditionalist family the wrong way, and they've cut off the financial aid they've provided you your whole life. But you don't care-you know you're doing the right thing by taking on the rough jobs of a low-ranking guard, and you're ready to shine based on your own merits, not those of your lofty kin.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Diplomacy skill and Legal Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks to Interact with members of Absalom's political establishment. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{Hobnobber} skill feat.

Post Guard of All Trades.name: Post Guard of All Trades
Post Guard of All Trades.description:
Not all cops are passionate about their jobs. For some, the pursuit of justice is just another way to pay the bills. Honestly, it was probably the Post Guard's generous time-off policy that drew you to their service, and during your yearly sabbaticals you've dabbled in hobbies as diverse as fishing, baking, or even stand-up comedy. Even while on duty, you're probably idly fiddling with a lucky coin or practicing magic tricks with a deck of cards. You probably irritate your fellow guards a bit with your non sequiturs, casual attitude, and tendency to daydream, but results don't lie, and more often than not you prove your worth when the chips are down.

For all the excitement of guarding Absalom's Postern Gate, the Post Guard wasn't really the right fit for someone as distractible as yourself, so your boss put in a "promotion" for you to transfer to the newly formed Edgewatch. You're all for the reassignment, since it will put you smack in the middle of the most entertaining and diverse gathering of the century, the Radiant Festival.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Performance skill, a Lore skill of your choice, and you gain a bonus language. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} with Post Guards. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Dubious Knowledge} skill feat.

Press-Ganged (G&G).name: 抓上船的(G&G) Press-Ganged (G&G)
Press-Ganged (G&G).description:
五杯还是六杯？不过这都不重要了，因为在那些好心的人把你所有的酒都买下来后，你醒来的时候就已经在船的底仓了。无论你是船上的船员，还是应征入伍者，抑或是其他更糟的情况，你已无处可去。这种背景通常需要整个团队的参与来讲述一个故事，让你能够扮演一个角色，在他们自己无法控制的情况下开始冒险。然而，你也可以扮演一个曾经被抓上船，后来逃离了那种生活的角色。如果是这样，那这个背景就没有罕见特征，但其数据并不受影响。

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是力量或体质，另一项为自选属性加成。

你在运动和劳工学识（Labor Lore）技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Lc4dJZivRwU3QEmT]{穿甲助手 Armor Assist}技能专长。

Press-Ganged (LOWG).name: Press-Ganged (LOWG)
Press-Ganged (LOWG).description:
Prerequisite Region - High Seas

You were forced into service as a sailor against your will. Perhaps you were punished for a crime, were drafted into military service, are repaying a debt, or simply were abducted. Though you were initially trained as a simple deckhand, you may have subsequently studied a trade under one of the vessel's specialists.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是力量或感知，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in the Society skill and the Sailing Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sMm0UfYxEPpq2Yzd]{Experienced Professional} skill feat.

Printer.name: 印刷商 Printer
Printer.description:
密切关注城市的脉搏，你创立了个新闻小报在街角售卖。为了实现这个目标，您租用了一台印刷机，因此您熟悉这种机器。然而，人物和他们的故事才是你的主要焦点，因此你总是冒险追逐最新的独家新闻。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在社群（Society）和抄写学识（Scribing Lore）技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P9HCz0uR6xPHuw72]{额外语言 Multilingual}技能专长。

Purveyor of the Bizzare.name: Purveyor of the Bizzare
Purveyor of the Bizzare.description:
Prerequisite Region - Golden Road

Whether in Katapesh or one of the bustling markets along the Path of Salt, you've spent enough time buying and selling ancient or unusual items to give you an instinctive ability to quickly sort valuable trinkets from worthless baubles.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Arcana skill and the Mercantile Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IlOQuCQIhjJpig3S]{Quick Identification} skill feat.

Pyre Tender.name: 火葬搭造工 Pyre Tender
Pyre Tender.description:
在搭建葬礼的柴堆这事上，你很有一套。你可能在林诺姆诸王国的土地上让棺材熊熊燃烧，搭造过切利亚斯或伏陀罗的火葬坑，或是个粗木炭烧炭工，用正确的炼金混合物作为助燃剂。不管你崇拜什么，你知道没有什么比火更能让已经离去的人上路。

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是Dexterity或智力，另一项为自选属性加成。

你在手艺和葬礼学识（Funeral Lore skill）上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{制作炼金物品 Alchemical Crafting}技能专长。

Quick.name: Quick
Quick.description:
Prerequisite Region - Impossible Lands

Staying alive among the scheming, ravenous undead of Geb required a deep knowledge of their motivations, capabilities, and weaknesses. More often than not, it also required the ability to weave alibis and life-preserving half-truths capable of swaying a stilled heart.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是魅力或体质，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Deception skill and the Undead Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.B6HbYsLBWb1RR6Fx]{Charming Liar}skill feat.

Ratted-Out Gun Runner.name: Ratted-Out Gun Runner
Ratted-Out Gun Runner.description:
Sure, you've got a checkered past. Who doesn't? It's hard to make a living in the City of Smog, so you did what you could to put silvers in your pocket and food on the table. You made a good deal of money selling firearms from the Gunworks to people who perhaps shouldn't have had them. You even worked with wasteland marauders a few times, sticking up Ustradi barges plying the river between the Gunworks and Alkenstar. Of course, you never hurt any innocents or did anything truly heinous; your criminal career was always just a matter of money.

One day, a corrupt financier named Ambrost Mugland-a true crook if there ever was one-approached you, demanding a cut of your business. When you refused, he put in a word with the shieldmarshals that you'd be a certain somewhere at a certain time with a certain large quantity of illegally obtained firearms. Even though you escaped arrest, your identity was compromised, and your old accomplices have all turned their backs on you. Your gun-running days are clearly over. Now, you're just running.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是Dexterity或感知，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in the Stealth skill and the Firearm Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.t3btih0O5RUwWynt]{Experienced Smuggler} skill feat.

Razmiran Faithful.name: Razmiran Faithful
Razmiran Faithful.description:
Prerequisite Region - Broken Lands

You serve a living god who rules upon the face of Golarion, and this gives your actions a divine mandate not to be trifled with.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Intimidation skill and the Razmir Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gUqvezs2zzoTXFAI]{Group Coercion} skill feat.

Reclaimed.name: Reclaimed
Reclaimed.description:
A unit of Crimson Reclaimers saved you from certain death in the Gravelands. You spent time with one or more Crimson Reclaimers as they escorted you to safety, and you've learned the ways of this faction of the Knights of Lastwall. You consider yourself forever in their debt and defend their reputation unquestioningly against any accusations of duplicity.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是体质或魅力，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in the Intimidation skill and the Crimson Reclaimers Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gUqvezs2zzoTXFAI]{Group Coercion} skill feat.

Reclaimer Investigator.name: Reclaimer Investigator
Reclaimer Investigator.description:
You believe the mysterious patron of the Crimson Reclaimers has an ulterior motive that bedevils the Knights of Lastwall. Whatever the organization gains from the pact, some mysterious force with its own agenda and a need for anonymity benefits as well. You've made it your mission to determine what that agenda is before the patron decides it has manipulated from the shadows long enough.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是Intelligence或感知，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in the Occultism skill and the Crimson Reclaimers Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hDGosy2ZTwnyctEP]{Oddity Identification} skill feat.

Refugee (Fall of Plaguestone).name: Refugee (Fall of Plaguestone)
Refugee (Fall of Plaguestone).description:
The fighting around the Lake Encarthan region has forced many of the people residing there to flee from the violence. Although your home is gone, you have managed to survive and are making your way south in search of a better life. When play begins, you are riding along in a caravan taking you to what might be either a new home in Andoran or simply another waypoint in your journey.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Survival skill and the Hunting Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager} skill feat.

Relentless Dedication.name: Relentless Dedication
Relentless Dedication.description:
Recruiters invite many candidates like you to train to be Knights of Lastwall, but only a select few make the cut. Whereas others lose heart, your perseverance paid off. Your commitment to the cause is so clear, it overcame whatever disqualified your previous attempts to join the new Shining Crusade.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是力量或体质，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in the Warfare Lore skill, and you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.i4yRvVwvXbGZDsD1]{Canny Acumen} feat.

Reputation Seeker.name: Reputation Seeker
Reputation Seeker.description:
You're likely from Breachill, but unlike the Local Scion, your family has no notable legacy in the area. You might not even have much of a family at all to call your own, and could be an orphan. You've seen so many people make names for themselves that you set out on your own and spent some time abroad in the jungles or deserts of Garund or in the upper reaches of the Darklands-regions that proved too dangerous to remain in for long on your own. You returned home with more caution and knowledge of the world beyond Breachill's borders, but still determined to win fame.

You've decided that joining an adventuring group would be the best way to secure aid in your quest to build your own reputation, and are attending the Call for Heroes to find such allies.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Survival skill and the Darklands, Desert, or Jungle Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4tTkRyOQ0VuRBac3]{Terrain Expertise} skill feat (underground if you have Darklands Lore, desert if you have Desert Lore, or forest if you have Jungle Lore).

Returning Descendant.name: Returning Descendant
Returning Descendant.description:
You aren't from Breachill yourself-you might not even be from Isger or Avistan at all. You've lived a hard life, in any event. You have often had to make tough decisions, and have developed a knack for understanding how things work (and the best way to take them apart) that has helped you support yourself. Recently you discovered that an ancestor was from the town of Breachill and had a modest career as an adventurer. You can't help but wonder if you would have had an easier life if you'd grown up there instead, and have decided to seek out this small town to learn more about it.

You've decided to respond to the Call for Heroes to follow in your ancestor's footsteps, either to honor their memory or accomplish the great deeds they did not.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Thievery skill and the Engineering Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jDdOqFmZLwE4dblQ]{Pickpocket} skill feat.

Revenant.name: 死而复生 Revenant
Revenant.description:
你死了。毫无疑问。一枪爆头或是一刀穿喉，你死的不能再死了。可是你又站了起来。也许是因为你有未竟的事业，或者你如此难搞又刻薄，以至于地狱都把你赶了出来。不管怎样，你回来是有原因的。

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是体质或魅力，另一项为自选属性加成。

你在宗教和骨园学识（Boneyard Lore）技能上受训。你仍然是活物，而非不死生物，但你有负能量治疗特性，这意味着你会像不死生物一样受到正能量伤害并被负能量治愈。

Rigger.name: Rigger
Rigger.description:
You've worked as a roustabout to erect tents and set up rigging for acrobatic performances; you've sometimes even aided aerialists and acrobats in their death-defying training. Even though your work is often done before the crowds arrive, you know your skills contribute to the success and safety of the circus. Mistress Dusklight treats her roustabouts as little more than slaves, and you've resolved to join a company where your expertise is appreciated.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或敏捷，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Athletics skill and the Circus Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.09PurtIanNUPfNRq]{Combat Climber} skill feat.

Rivethun Adherent.name: Rivethun Adherent
Rivethun Adherent.description:
Prerequisite Region - Shining Kingdoms

You have spent time learning the practices and traditions of the ancient Rivethun dwarven shamans and can recognize all sorts of magic. You may have chosen your own road since then, or you may remain an adherent of the philosophy.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Occultism skill and the Spirit Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell} skill feat.

Rostland Partisan.name: Rostland Partisan
Rostland Partisan.description:
Prerequisite Region - Broken Lands

You grew up among the southern houses of Brevoy in old Rostland. You're accustomed to arguing from a position of underappreciated worth.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Diplomacy skill and the Politics Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KpFetnUqTiweypZk]{Group Impression} skill feat.

Ruby Phoenix Enthusiast.name: Ruby Phoenix Enthusiast
Ruby Phoenix Enthusiast.description:
Named for the legendary sorcerer Hao Jin, the Ruby Phoenix Tournament occurs once every 10 years in Goka and attracts extraordinary talent from across the world. You might have begun training for the tournament but never participated, or perhaps you entered the tournament only to be defeated by (and inspired to join) the Pathfinder Society. Either way, your dedicated training prepares you for the rigors of the adventuring lifestyle.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或敏捷，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Athletics skill and the Gladiatorial Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.09PurtIanNUPfNRq]{Combat Climber} skill feat. In addition, you gain access to one of the following uncommon monk weapons:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zSAoyzcf3nSeZCiF]{Kama},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LA8wwpQBi6tylE6z]{Nunchaku},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.u2u6dkr01AB34tyA]{Sai},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.fjkwYZ0hRmBztwBG]{Shuriken}, or
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.NIsxR5zXtVa3PuyU]{Temple Sword}.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 3 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

Ruby Phoenix Fanatic.name: 赤凰粉丝 Ruby Phoenix Fanatic
Ruby Phoenix Fanatic.description:
你听说过绝世大法师郝金吗，她还有个名号叫做赤凰？你太了解她了！你是她最忠实的粉丝！她拥有惊人的涅槃重生之力，她的头发像凤凰一样炽烈如火，她有一个巨大的宝库，里面装满了整个多元宇宙中最不可思议的宝藏。现在，她终于结束了长达300 年的神秘之旅，从轴心城（Axis）位面回来了，所以她本人将亲自主持今年的赤凰武道大会——你已经迫不及待要见她了！为了尽可能接近郝金，你已经研究了所有关于赤凰的家乡、她跨位面的旅途以及她竞争对手的一切知识。你也不断磨练自己的身体来证明自己配得上冠军的宝座。当郝金的组委会邀请你和一些朋友参加预选赛时，你兴奋得差点晕倒。你和赤凰本人见面的梦想即将要实现了吗？只要一路披荆斩棘进入正式比赛，它就是非常有可能的！如果之后你有机会和她说话的话请不要表现得太过狂热，好吗？

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你的轴心城学识（Axis Lore）、角斗学识（Gladiatorial Lore）学识、过峡学识（Goka Lore）技能受训，你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{诡异知识 Dubious Knowledge}技能专长作为奖励。

Ruin Delver.name: Ruin Delver
Ruin Delver.description:
You've looked through some of the smaller ruins in the Otari hinterlands but have never quite built up the courage to check out the creepy lighthouse called Gauntlight. You've heard that these ruins are pretty well picked over, and mostly collapsed, but you always planned to some day explore them and perhaps find some bauble left behind from the centuries-old battle where the Roseguard slew an evil sorcerer. You know that the crumbled stone of old ruins has a tendency to shift, so you'd better step lightly if you get the chance to explore Gauntlight.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in Acrobatics and the Roseguard Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{Cat Fall} skill feat.

Saboteur.name: 破坏者 Saboteur
Saboteur.description:
不管你是为了个人享受，还是受雇佣兵公司或军事组织的要求，你都有破坏事物的诀窍。你能够感知到一个物体或建筑的弱点，并知道在哪里使用锤击或炼金炸弹。你的冒险是为了磨练你的技能或完成一个特殊的任务。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或敏捷，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在贼活和工程学识（Engineering Lore）技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.B9cQLRHtXoLlF0iR]{藏物于动 Concealing Legerdemain技能专长。

Sally Guard Neophyte.name: Sally Guard Neophyte
Sally Guard Neophyte.description:
You joined the Sally Guard, Westgate's guard precinct, at an early age, bringing with you the requisite steel armor, sword, and lance, though your gear is of dubious make. The other guards may have suspected that you were a novice with less combat experience than them; if so, you proved their suspicions on your first day of training when your mount immediately threw you in the mud. A supervisor took mercy on you and offered to transfer you to another guard unit in the city, promising that you'd have a place on the Sally Guard when you decided you were ready for the challenge.

Biting your lip in shame, you took the Edgewatch reassignment in order to gain the experience necessary to go back to your home district with your head held high. You'll prove them wrong, one way or another, and show everyone that you can protect the ones you hold most dear.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Nature skill and your choice of Hunting Lore or Stabling Lore. You start out with a @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.In2nNwo3JL1RXQhj]{Riding Horse}, as well as a suit of shoddy @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.pRoikbRo5HFW6YUB]{Half Plate} armor, a shoddy @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{Longsword}, and a shoddy @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.OPMzQdM9rZznMGhW]{Lance}.

Saloon Entertainer.name: 酒吧艺人 Saloon Entertainer
Saloon Entertainer.description:
你只是想娱乐人们，但不出所料，问题总是追逐着你。枪战，斗殴，抢劫，和更糟糕的事总是发生在你表演的场所，而且这条消息在飞速传播。只有抢在流言蜚语到达前，你才有可能再次演出，掌控舞台，或者再次赢下游戏。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是魅力或敏捷，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在表演和任意你选择的学识技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lFwfUvH2708rl6i3]{精湛演技 Virtuosic Performer}技能专长。

Sandswept Survivor.name: Sandswept Survivor
Sandswept Survivor.description:
You were in the Sandswept Hall, the Pathfinder Society's lodge in Sothis, Osirion, when it came under attack from an unrelenting horde of undead. You endured the siege and forged new bonds with your fellow survivors, then joined the Society as a field agent.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是体质或感知，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in the Survival skill and a Lore skill related to a specific type of undead, such as Mummy Lore or Zombie Lore. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4tTkRyOQ0VuRBac3]{Terrain Expertise} skill feat with underground terrain.

Additionally, when you receive a mission briefing at the Sandswept Hall, your familiarity with its history and staff grants further insight. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your checks to Gather Information or Recall Knowledge during the Getting Started segment of such adventures. Be sure to remind your GM that you have a relevant background.

Sarkorian Reclaimer.name: Sarkorian Reclaimer
Sarkorian Reclaimer.description:
Prerequisite Region - Broken Lands

Whether you trace your heritage to lost Sarkoris or are a crusader trying to atone for past fanatics' wrongs, you seek to liberate the Sarkorian homeland from the demons who have defiled it.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或感知, and one is a free boost.

You're trained in the Medicine skill and the Abyssal Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine} skill feat.

Sarkorian Survivor.name: Sarkorian Survivor
Sarkorian Survivor.description:
Prerequisite Region - Broken Lands

The devastation and carnage of the Worldwound were nearly complete, but you somehow managed to survive it.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或体质, and one is a free boost.

You're trained in the Survival skill and the Sarkorian History Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager} skill feat.

Saved by Clockwork.name: 发条殖装 Saved by Clockwork
Saved by Clockwork.description:
因为血腥的战斗，可怕的事故，亦或是伟大的献身，你失去了身体的一部分，而被发条机械所取代。不论是你的手臂现在是喷发着蒸汽的气泵、钢圈和铁齿轮的组合体；或者你的心脏变成一个复杂的水晶钟，需要每天上发条；亦或者你的小腿变成了是一个由蒸汽驱动的精钢弹簧和雕刻金属管，总之你的一部分需要定期维护和修理。你可能收到了拯救你的天才发明家的指示，或者你可能在战场上醒来，却不记得这个过程或涉及的人。无论如何，你拥有照顾自己的知识——即使是如何在自己的心脏上拧钥匙或重修一个机关脚。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在手艺技能上受训。每天你必须花10分钟来保养或给你的部件上发条，否则就有面临部件故障的风险，其后果取决于你更换的是什么部件（由你和GM决定）。你的发条装置让你对危险反应更加敏捷，你在先攻骰上获得+2环境加值。

Savior of Air.name: Savior of Air
Savior of Air.description:
Upon securing the Untouchable Opal, an artifact of extraordinary power, the Pathfinder Society endeavored to free the benevolent demigod Ranginori, who was trapped within the virtually unbreakable prison. You might have joined the Pathfinder Society in its expeditions to the Elemental Planes, or you might have lived on one of those planes before learning of the Society from these Pathfinder agents. You are no stranger to navigating precarious terrain as a result.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Acrobatics skill, plus either Elemental Lords Lore or a Lore skill related either to one of the Elemental Planes (such as Plane of Air Lore). You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{Cat Fall} skill feat. Add Auran to the list of additional languages you can learn for having a high Intelligence modifier.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 8 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

Scholar.name: 学者 Scholar
Scholar.description:
你有学习的天分，你两耳不闻窗外事，只求能学到尽可能多的知识。你在书中读到了许多奇妙的地方和事物，并且总是梦想有一天能亲眼目睹它们。最终，这种好奇心引领着你放下学业，成为了一名冒险者。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在奥法（Arcana）、自然、神秘或宗教技能上受训，并获得针对你所选技能的技能专长：@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{驾轻就熟 Assurance}。你还会在学术（Academia）学识技能上受训。

Scholar of the Ancients.name: Scholar of the Ancients
Scholar of the Ancients.description:
Prerequisite Region - High Seas

You're fascinated by the lost Azlanti Empire and have dedicated yourself to seeking out and studying every broken artifact or scrap of knowledge that remains, whether as an academic pursuit or simply for the joy of treasure hunting.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Arcana skill and the Azlant Lore skills. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IlOQuCQIhjJpig3S]{Quick Identification} skill feat.

Scholar of the Sky Key.name: Scholar of the Sky Key
Scholar of the Sky Key.description:
The unfamiliar technology of Numeria's Silver Mount still baffles Society scholars, yet you are one of the innovators who discovered how to operate a handful of these futuristic tools-possibly after surviving more than a few explosions. The Society might have recruited you for your esoteric abilities, or you might have sought out the Society's protection in escaping the covetously vile Technic League. Even if your understanding of advanced technology is imperfect, your hard-learned lessons are invaluable in deciphering and repairing gear.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Crafting skill and the Engineering Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ASy9AKEIRxPYUi5o]{Quick Repair} skill feat.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 6 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

Scion of Slayers.name: 杀手后裔 Scion of Slayers
Scion of Slayers.description:
你是某个亡灵杀手的后裔。杀戮对你的家庭来说不只是职业——更像是一种神秘的责任，从父辈传递给孩子。几代人过去，这种单纯的执念以某种超自然的方式显现在战斗之中。

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是力量或智力，另一项为自选属性加成。

你在运动技能和不死学识（Undead Loreskill）上受训。你能以内在神术的形式施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kcelf6IHl3L9VXXg]{打击死灵 Disrupt Undead}戏法。你可以将智力作为这一内在法术的施法属性。

Second Chance Champion.name: 东山再起 Second Chance Champion
Second Chance Champion.description:
你参加过十年前的赤凰武道大会，但没能赢到最后。一次错误的走位、一个错误的时机、一道被打断的咒语——无论因为什么，你的对手占了上风，将你淘汰出局。好吧，也许这只是个小错误，或者你当时状态不好，你就是固执地不肯承认失败。现在，经过了十年的训练之后，你确信自己不再会重复之前的错误，你和朋友组建了一支队伍，最大限度地提高你进入决赛的机会。不管之前发生过什么，你发誓要回到过峡的擂台上再次进行一场史诗级的重塞，而这一次你不赢得赤凰冠军不会善罢甘休！

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或力量，另一项为自选属性提升。

你的特技和角斗学识（Gladiatorial Lore）受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{轻身落 Cat Fall}技能专长作为奖励。

Secular Medic.name: Secular Medic
Secular Medic.description:
Prerequisite Region - Golden Road

You're from Rahadoum, where the Laws of Mortality taught you to reject the gods, yet you've seen firsthand how dangerous it can be to go without healing magic. As a result, you've thrown yourself into the study of medicine, so you can save lives without saving souls.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是感知或敏捷，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Medicine skill and the Anatomy Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine} skill feat.

Senghor Sailor.name: Senghor Sailor
Senghor Sailor.description:
Prerequisite Region - Mwangi Expanse

As an experienced sailor from Senghor, you know that the only thing saving you from disaster on the high seas is a properly maintained ship. You know boat-building inside and out and you can quickly cobble together a solution in the event that something breaks.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Crafting skill and the Sailing Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ASy9AKEIRxPYUi5o]{Quick Repair} skill feat.

Sentinel Reflectance.name: Sentinel Reflectance
Sentinel Reflectance.description:
Either through witnessing their deeds and devout heroics firsthand, or through reading chronicles of their exploits, the Shining Sentinels of the Knights of Lastwall inspire you. You may idealize their philosophy or one day hope to join their ranks; the Shining Sentinels are your guiding star.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是力量或魅力，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in the Diplomacy skill and the Shining Sentinels Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6ON8DjFXSMITZleX]{No Cause for Alarm} skill feat.

Sewer Dragon.name: Sewer Dragon
Sewer Dragon.description:
Prerequisites Kobald Ancestry

You are one of the Sewer Dragons, born in Absalom's sewers, strengthened by a life defending your territory.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。 You're trained in the Crafting skill and the Kobold Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.DMetdzt1VJL2Y62i]{Snare Crafting} skill feat.

Shadow Haunted.name: Shadow Haunted
Shadow Haunted.description:
Prerequisite Region - Old Cheliax

You are from Nidal, and regardless of your personal values, Zon-Kuthon has a claim on your soul due to an ancient pact. The Midnight Lord's unsettling influence is bred deep into your bones.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Intimidation skill and the Shadow Plane Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ar2DUlvDK4LDcH9J]{Quick Coercion} skill feat.

Shadow Lodge Defector.name: Shadow Lodge Defector
Shadow Lodge Defector.description:
You were among the Pathfinders recruited by the devious Shadow Lodge, lured in by promises of wealth, reform, justice, or revenge. You might have fought against the Society's loyal agents, helped sabotage the Pathfinders' reputation in distant countries, or even infiltrated the far-flung lodges as a spy. You've since made peace with and rejoined the Pathfinder Society, yet the underhanded reflexes and skills you learned are hard to forget.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Deception skill and the Underworld Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Dvz54d6aPhjsmUux]{Lie To Me} skill feat.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 2 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

Shadow War Survivor.name: Shadow War Survivor
Shadow War Survivor.description:
Countless factions have fought for influence in Absalom for millennia, and for decades these groups worked through the Pathfinder Society to better control the City at the Center of the World. Perhaps you were ones of these agents who clashed with other operatives during the so-called Shadow War. Or you might have been an unintended victim of these clandestine clashes, inspiring you to join the Society and stop the conflict from within. Whatever the reason, navigating the Shadow War has left you politically savvy and informed.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是感知或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Society skill and the Absalom Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.X2jGFfLU5qI5XVot]{Streetwise} skill feat.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 1 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

Sheriff.name: 警长 Sheriff
Sheriff.description:
你在一个小社区里拥有警长或副警长的正式头衔。那些伤害其他人的家伙会躲避你的目光，因为他们知道这会带来你承诺的惩罚。你保护这你们的城镇，保护那些信任你们的人，确保那些伤害他人的恶徒被绳之以法。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在恐吓和狩猎学识（Hunting Lore）技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gUqvezs2zzoTXFAI]{集体胁迫 Group Coercion}技能专长。

Shoanti Name-Bearer.name: Shoanti Name-Bearer
Shoanti Name-Bearer.description:
Prerequisite Region - Saga Lands

You are a member of a Shoanti quah and have gone through its coming of age ceremony, gaining the traditional tattoo of your quah and earning your adult name.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Athletics skill and the Quah Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.09PurtIanNUPfNRq]{Combat Climber} skill feat.

Shory Seeker.name: Shory Seeker
Shory Seeker.description:
You've dedicated your life to unraveling the secrets of the ancient Shory Empire, either through meticulous research or by traveling into dangerous and distant ruins to track down long-lost artifacts.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Crafting skill and the Shory Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{Specialty Crafting} skill feat.

Sleepless Suns Star.name: Sleepless Suns Star
Sleepless Suns Star.description:
Among your fellow guards who patrol the Foreign Quarter, you're something of a big deal. Your good work and big personality have made a big enough splash that word has gotten out about your status as a rising star among the watchdogs of Absalom. Your popularity has also earned you the trust of many citizens of the Foreign Quarter.

Your laudable performance has earned you a transfer to the newly formed Edgewatch in the Precipice Quarter, where you'll put your formidable reputation to good use by patrolling the Radiant Festival and ensuring the safety of Absalom's most vulnerable visitors.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是感知或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Society, plus either Gladiatorial Lore or Genealogy Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} with members of the Sleepless Suns and residents of the Foreign Quarter. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P9HCz0uR6xPHuw72]{Multilingual} skill feat.

Snubbed Out Stoolie.name: Snubbed Out Stoolie
Snubbed Out Stoolie.description:
You were once a distinguished informant for the shieldmarshals, working deep undercover to infiltrate gangs of bootleggers and assassins. Then, one day, you discovered that the records of your service had all been completely destroyed. In an instant, you were no longer an elite spy impersonating a criminal-you were just a plain criminal.

Now, not a trace remains of your work for the city. Not only is it as though you were never a shieldmarshal at all, but you've got a rap sheet implicating you as a key member in the criminal organizations you spent your career infiltrating. Luckily, no one could take away the skills you learned from your deep-cover missions, and your new notoriety has earned you quite a reputation among Alkenstar's criminal elite. Through your underworld connections, you've identified Deputy Shieldmarshal Anjelique Loveless as the one responsible for your fall from grace. It seems you were onto something that she didn't want you to know about, but there's only one way to figure out exactly why Loveless ruined your reputation and gave you your outlaw status-find her.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是力量或魅力，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in the Deception skill and the Underworld Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Dvz54d6aPhjsmUux]{Lie to Me} skill feat.

Sodden Scavenger.name: Sodden Scavenger
Sodden Scavenger.description:
Prerequisite Region - Mwangi Expanse

You've managed to eke out an existence in the storm-wracked Sodden Lands and have become an expert at scavenging food and tools.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Survival skill and the Swamp Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager} skill feat.

Songsinger in Training.name: Songsinger in Training
Songsinger in Training.description:
You are a pupil of Argakoa the Songsinger, Otter House leader and Mammoth Lord. Argakoa has been the Broken Tusk's foremost songsinger for many winters, and she sees in you a promising disciple who can carry the torch when it's time for her to pass it. The role of songsinger is a great distinction. These chanters, musicians, and poets are responsible for recording, preserving, and sharing the Broken Tusk's oral history. As one of these songsingers, it's up to you to decide which stories are worthy of passing on and which should be left along the migration trail.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Performance skill and the Genealogy Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xqAdXRd2gSQcqp5E]{Impressive Performance} skill feat.

Spell Seeker.name: Spell Seeker
Spell Seeker.description:
Conventional magic can only hold your attention for so long. Instead, you've devoted yourself to understanding truly esoteric spells, which invariably draws you to explore the world and all its eldritch traditions.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是Intelligence或感知，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in either the Arcana skill or Occult skill, as well as the Library Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell} skill feat.

Sponsored by Family.name: Sponsored by Family
Sponsored by Family.description:
Several members of your family have studied at the Magaambya, although not all of them have graduated as lore-speakers (or even advanced past initiates to become attendants). Your family has decided that you're an excellent candidate to join their ranks. Although lore-speakers of the Magaambya know they are supported by the strength of thousands of graduates who have come before them, you can take the smaller, more personal comfort in the support of your family.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是Intelligence或魅力，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in your choice of the Diplomacy or Society skill. You gain a skill feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{Hobnobber} if you chose Diplomacy or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0N8TtGSk5enoLBZ8]{Eye For Numbers} if you chose Society. You're also trained in Magaambya Lore.

Your recommended primary branch is the Uzunjati.

Sponsored by Teacher Ot.name: Sponsored by Teacher Ot
Sponsored by Teacher Ot.description:
You have known the Magaambyan teacher Takulu Ot and his wife Niana for many years. Both are amateur bird-watchers and musicians, and you share one of these hobbies. They are pleasant people and well-regarded in Nantambu, although their unshakable generosity and friendliness strike cynics as too earnest to be genuine. You know otherwise; Takulu and Niana are just as sincere as they appear. Takulu always seemed to watch you with a discerning eye, and one day he idly observed that you'd do well at the Magaambya. Talking about it further with him, Takulu agreed that he would sponsor you personally and be the one to give your intake interview. With a twinkle in his eye, he asked that you call him Teacher Ot from now on, just as all of his students do.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是Wisdom或魅力，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in your choice of the Survival or Performance skill. You gain a skill feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tGIXuk0XeWmG04CX]{Survey Wildlife} if you chose Survival or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xqAdXRd2gSQcqp5E]{Impressive Performance} if you chose Performance. You're also trained in Nantambu Lore.

Your recommended primary branch is the Emerald Boughs.

Sponsored by a Stranger.name: Sponsored by a Stranger
Sponsored by a Stranger.description:
You remember the day the stranger approached you to make several peculiar inquiries. You don't remember much about them, other than a large head and a frail body. At first, the stranger's questions seemed odd: how might forgotten history nevertheless shape the present, whether an insect hive mind could be manipulated at a distance, and so on. You don't remember all of the questions, and you don't know why you could refuse to answer some but felt compelled to answer others. The stranger nevertheless seemed pleased with your responses and insisted you would find study at the Magaambya enlightening. You never saw them again, but you're now here at the Magaambya, with more questions than answers about your future.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是Intelligence或感知，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in your choice of the Occultism or Nature skill. You gain your choice of the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Dubious Knowledge} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IlOQuCQIhjJpig3S]{Quick Identification} skill feat. You're also trained in Insect Lore. Your recommended primary branch is the Rain-Scribes.

Sponsored by a Village.name: Sponsored by a Village
Sponsored by a Village.description:
You come from a small community far from any large cities, but the Magaambya is known even in your isolated corner of the world. You have shown more scholarly talent than anyone from your village in many years, perhaps even generations, and the village elders have insisted you explore your potential at the Magaambya. Whether you were eager to leave or not seemed irrelevant to the elders; you had the talent, so you must go. You don't know how the elders had the connections or influence to sponsor your education there, but you've left your tight- knit community behind for the city of Nantambu and the Magaambya at its heart.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是Intelligence或感知，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in your choice of the Crafting or Survival skill. You gain a skill feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.voYr7ygVcWmlg1f4]{Crafter's Appraisal} if you chose Crafting or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager} if you chose Survival. You're also trained in the Lore skill appropriate for the terrain around your community (such as Forest Lore or Jungle Lore).

Your recommended primary branch is the Cascade Bearers.

Spotter.name: 观察手 Spotter
Spotter.description:
对细节的洞察力，对风力的感知，以及对自己直觉的强烈信任。这当你帮助神枪手对他们的目标进行完美的射击时，这些特质让你与众不同。海拔高度、速度和隐蔽性——这些都是需要考虑的关键因素，需要真正的射击技巧，缺少了有经验的观察手，任何一个狙击手都无法发挥作用。从你年轻的时候开始，你就以作为观测者的技能作为一个冒险家来工作。无论你现在是为自己观测还是为他人观测，你的天赋会让你在冒险事业中占据优势。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在潜行和侦察学识（Scouting Lore）技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.beyw5bdA5hkQbmaG]{地形潜伏 Terrain Stalker}技能专长。

Starwatcher.name: Starwatcher
Starwatcher.description:
You're one of Wrin Sivinxi's closest confidantes. You've spent many long nights with her under the stars, learning the tales associated with the Cosmic Caravan and how the heavens can predict the future. You know that Wrin has paralyzing claustrophobia; she sees menace in angles and danger in confined spaces, which is why her shop is an all domed canvas that opens to the sky. If Wrin thinks there's trouble, you'll be the first to offer to help.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Occultism skill and the Astrology Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Dubious Knowledge} skill feat.

Storm Survivor.name: Storm Survivor
Storm Survivor.description:
Prerequisite Region - High Seas

Through luck or through skill, you managed to survive a catastrophic maritime disaster, such as a shipwreck or being thrown overboard. You have a keen sense for weather or situations that are similar to the one you escaped.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Survival skill and the Weather Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager} skill feat.

Student of Magic.name: Student of Magic
Student of Magic.description:
你目前就读于一所魔法学校，在那里你正在学习魔法的基础知识。无论你的冒险是在学期之间的休假，还是作为勤工俭学计划的一部分，甚至就是学业本身，你都必须学会如何处理你的双重生活。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在奥法，自然，神秘或宗教还有学术学识（Academia Lore）上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{认知法术 Recognize Spell}技能专长。

Surge Investigator.name: 涌动调查员 Surge Investigator
Surge Investigator.description:
从魅惑所有靠近者的河流到通过梦境和人交流的森林，你已经经历并研究了许多种类的魔法地形。世界上的魔法如此充盈，以至于它甚至可以影响土地本身。你四处求学，就是为了学习能识别魔法地形的古怪之处的方法。

选择两项属性提升，一项必须为体质或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

根据你的选择，你的自然或神秘技能、以及魔法地形学识（Magical Terrain Lore）受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4tTkRyOQ0VuRBac3]{地形专家 Terrain Expertise}技能专长。

Taldan Schemer.name: Taldan Schemer
Taldan Schemer.description:
Prerequisite Region - Shining Kingdoms

Whether willing or unwilling, you have been involved in the many cutthroat political intrigues within Taldor. You might have been born into it as a member of the aristocracy, or you might have taken an active role in the recent events of the War for the Crown.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是魅力或体质，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Diplomacy skill and the Politics Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{Hobnobber} skill feat.

Tall Tale.name: 惊世传说 Tall Tale
Tall Tale.description:
你，驾驭旋风，捆住河流，在满月下溜龙，对着丧尸一枪六杀。不管怎么说，故事就是这么吹的，即使人们不完全相信这些故事，他们也会对你感到好奇。当然，故事一直在传播，看起来你要么有独特的命运，要么试图让世界相信你有。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在表演技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xqAdXRd2gSQcqp5E]{动人表演 Impressive Performance}技能专长。你可以之后在社群没达到专家，或者没有贵族风范（Courtly Graces）的前提下，获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iCv8KTZ5PcF4GqeV]{关系户 Connections}专长——这不是传统意义上的社交关系，而是你的传奇故事不断传播，你学会了利用你的传奇故事，让人们想见你自己。

Teacher.name: 教师 Teacher
Teacher.description:
你知识渊博，技艺精湛，甚至可能接受过向孩子和成人传述世界及其奇迹的训练。从书本到课堂，你致力于将知识传授给所有人。不过，并非所有东西都能从书上教授或学习到，所以你成为了一名冒险者，更直接地研究一些课题，并将这些智慧带回给你的学生。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在表演或社群技能，以及学术（Academia）学识技能上受训。你获得技能专长：@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sMm0UfYxEPpq2Yzd]{熟练工 Experienced Professional}。

Teamster.name: Teamster
Teamster.description:
You left your home a few months back for a life on the road, working for one caravan company and then another, always on the lookout for a new job and a better life. Last week, you were hired by the Bort Bargith's company in Elidir. You don't know anyone from the company just yet, but most of its members seem to be honest merchants and traders.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Nature skill and the Mercantile Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nowEaHgIyij7im8F]{Train Animal} skill feat.

Tech Reliant.name: 技术依赖 Tech Reliant
Tech Reliant.description:
一些事件，不管是事故、袭击或者灾难吧，都让你因为魔法留下了可怕的疤痕。你的身体不再能容忍魔法治疗，你也不能使用魔法，这迫使你在其他人相信法术和魔法物品的时候，必须依赖于小工具和自己的匠心 。你以前可能对魔法很精通，或者完全不懂它。反正这件事以明显的方式伤害你的身体，而无论你的伤害有多严重，你的身体已经无法再和治疗法术产生任何反应。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在手艺和医疗技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{战地医疗 Battle Medicine}技能专长，并且在对抗法术的豁免骰上获得+1环境加值，治疗法术、治疗魔法物品、以及带有治疗特征的法术效果都对你无效。

Thassilonian Delver.name: Thassilonian Delver
Thassilonian Delver.description:
As archaeologists uncovered and explored ever-larger numbers of Thassilonian ruins, you were among the eager explorers who sought out the Runelords' ancient secrets. You may have been the apprentice to another Pathfinder who perished on an expedition, leaving you their discoveries and notes. Or perhaps you explored several of these sites yourself, quickly learning to parse the arcane secrets before lest the eldritch magic extinguish your life.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Arcana skill and the Thassilonian History Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.blMeVamjGz4ODWxq]{Arcane Sense} skill feat. Add Thassilonian to the list of additional languages you can learn for having a high Intelligence modifier.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 4 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

Thassilonian Traveler.name: Thassilonian Traveler
Thassilonian Traveler.description:
Prerequisite Region - Saga Lands

You come from ancient Thassilon, one of the citizens that appeared out of time alongside the city of Xin-Edasseril. You know many things that have been long forgotten... along with many things that are no longer correct.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Arcana skill and the Thassilon Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Dubious Knowledge} skill feat.

Thrune Loyalist.name: Thrune Loyalist
Thrune Loyalist.description:
Prerequisite Region - Old Cheliax

Despite the setbacks Cheliax has suffered recently, your loyalties lie with the devil-backed House Thrune. You consider the current queen to be the rightful ruler of your homeland, and you are willing to act against her enemies.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Religion skill and the Hell Lore skill You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x7EMZNMavris2aHY]{Student of the Canon} skill feat.

Thuvian Unifier.name: Thuvian Unifier
Thuvian Unifier.description:
Prerequisite Region - Golden Road

You believe the city-states of Thuvia should be united into one nation under the rule of your home city (most commonly Aspenthar), and you're willing to do whatever it takes to make it happen.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Intimidation skill and the Politics Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ar2DUlvDK4LDcH9J]{Quick Coercion} skill feat.

Tomb Born.name: 自死而生 Tomb Born
Tomb Born.description:
你的父母在一处沾染着死亡的地点——像是人类的古墓、巨型坟墓、或藏骨堂，为了某种堕落不堪的目的怀上了你。他们的目的或许是个迷，你也有可能知道他们宏大的设想并寻求逃离（也有可能是达成）它的方法。不论如何，在濒临死亡之时，你才最为危险。

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是Dexterity或体质，另一项为自选属性加成。

你在不死学识（Undead Lore skill）上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.jbmXxq56swDYw8hy]{濒死一咬 Final Spite}反应动作。

Touched by Dahak.name: Touched by Dahak
Touched by Dahak.description:
[Legacy - Age of Ashes]

As the manifestation of Dahak was destroyed, a shard of the dragon god's wrathful nature infused you, resulting in a violent temper, strange apocalyptic dreams, an obsession with dragon hunting, or some other touch of his influence.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Athletics skill and the Dragon Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KxaYlC50zzHysJj8]{Titan Wrestler} skill feat.

Toymaker.name: 玩具商人 Toymaker
Toymaker.description:
你喜欢为所有年龄段的孩子们制作小玩具，看到他们的脸因您的一件作品而发光，会给您的内心带来快乐。也许你在一个特定的商店出售你的商品，或者当你从一个城镇到另一个城镇旅行时，在马车后窗出售你的商品。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在手艺和商业学识（Mercantile Lore）技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{独门手艺 Specialty Crafting}技能专长，选择艺术、打铁、玻璃制造、制皮、裁缝或木工之一作为你的专攻方向。

Trade Consortium Underling.name: Trade Consortium Underling
Trade Consortium Underling.description:
Prerequisite Region - Absalom and Starstone Isle

Your experience as a ledger-keeper for one of Absalom's trade guilds has made you a canny investor and shrewd entrepreneur.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Society skill and the Business Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sMm0UfYxEPpq2Yzd]{Experienced Professional} skill feat.

Trailblazer.name: Trailblazer
Trailblazer.description:
Uncharted realms have always intrigued you, and you've explored and mapped large territories in service to merchants, governments, or your own curiosity. Where some see a blank spot on a map, you see the potential for something new and undiscovered.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Survival skill and the Cartography Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4tTkRyOQ0VuRBac3]{Terrain Expertise} skill feat with one terrain you've explored (such as forest or underground).

Translator.name: Translator
Translator.description:
In your youth, you learned to transcribe books and translate scrolls to preserve knowledge or perhaps to aid wealthy merchants and politicians. Whether you set out to make your own fortune or are drawn to decipher the strangest codes, your linguistic training will guide your discoveries.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Society skill and the Scribing Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P9HCz0uR6xPHuw72]{Multilingual} skill feat.

Truth Seeker.name: Truth Seeker
Truth Seeker.description:
Whether you are a local or from out of town, you've heard rumors that Breachill's past contains a hidden secret. Perhaps you've heard strange rumors that the town's founder, Lamond Breachton, was not the hero everyone touts, or maybe your grandmother heard stories from her own grandmother that contradict the town's accepted narrative of its establishment. In the pursuit of the truth, you've learned to navigate the tangles of politics, and to never take anyone's word at face value.

You plan to join the Call for Heroes so that you can make yourself known to the council, or perhaps even ingratiating yourself to them, so you can seek the truth and eventually uncover Breachill's secrets!

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Deception skill and the Politics Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Dvz54d6aPhjsmUux]{Lie To Me} skill feat.

Tyrant Witness.name: Tyrant Witness
Tyrant Witness.description:
When Tar-Baphon broke free of Gallowspire, you saw him emerge. When the god-slaying lich obliterated Vigil and Roslar's Coffer, you scrambled to safety. And when necrotic rainfall swept through the lands and the Gallowgarden grew, you weathered the storms. Others talk of what the Whispering Tyrant's return did to Lastwall, but you were there. And it changed you.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是Dexterity或感知，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in the Undead Lore skill. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kcelf6IHl3L9VXXg]{Disrupt Undead} as a divine innate cantrip. As normal, the cantrip heightens to half your level rounded up.

Ulfen Raider.name: Ulfen Raider
Ulfen Raider.description:
Prerequisite Region - Saga Lands

You are an Ulfen warrior, feared among Avistan for the merciless and devastating raids your people once conducted along the shores. Though the days of these Ulfen raids are largely past, you have been trained to strike terror into the hearts of those who face you.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Intimidation skill and the Sailing Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQMz6eDgX75WX2ce]{Intimidating Glare} skill feat.

Undercover Contender.name: 卧底英雄 Undercover Contender
Undercover Contender.description:
黑帮和骗子们对赤凰武道大会的兴趣就像食人鱼见着流血的河马一般，而你则一心要确保这场锦标赛尽可能地不出岔子。你有自己的理由——也许是过峡的一个高级官员让你处理某个案子，也可能是上届比赛中有人犯规而导致你永远失去心中所爱。也许你只是讨厌看到恪守规则的选手被不讲武德的参赛者淘汰。无论你的动机是什么，你发誓要防止有人在擂台上破坏比赛。黄金联盟（Golden League）的罪犯们嫌疑最为重大，因为他们在十年前插手过赤凰武道大会，但也有可能存在某些不择手段的竞争者试图拉拢郝金本人，或为了某种邪恶的阴谋而劫持她。如论发生哪种情况，你都必须确保自己能在现场挥舞着正义的铁拳。你把你的任务告诉了一小队最亲密的朋友，并且和他们成功拿到了预选赛的入场证。你和你的团队必须拿下足够多的胜利，在比赛中撑得足够久来确保一切都符合正轨。如果这意味着你可能最终成为赤凰冠军的话那就更好不过了。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是魅力或敏捷，另一项为自选属性提升。

你的欺骗和黑街学识（Underworld Lore）受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HEBXaS656MZTiWFu]{持久分神 Lengthy Diversion}技能专长作为奖励。

Undercover Lotus Guard.name: Undercover Lotus Guard
Undercover Lotus Guard.description:
It's a well-known secret that for every playhouse in the Ivy District, there's an underground criminal element lurking somewhere in the shadows. To get intel on the occultists, assassins, and thieves' guilds that pull the strings of power in the Ivy District, the Lotus Guard trains some of the best undercover agents and operatives in all of Absalom. You're one such agent, and you've put your life on the line more times than you can count by getting close to the Ivy's most dangerous criminals. Your risky missions and thrill-seeking derring-do have earned you many accolades-but also no shortage of enemies.

You transferred to the Edgewatch after your cover was unexpectedly blown and you needed a safe place to lie low away from the Ivy District. With your mastery of disguise and your ability to confidently converse with criminal masterminds, it won't be long before you've made yourself an indispensable undercover operator in this precinct as well.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Deception skill, Art Lore, and Underworld Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks to Interact with Lotus Guards and high-ranking criminals like guild masters, gang leaders, and mob bosses. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.B6HbYsLBWb1RR6Fx]{Charming Liar} skill feat.

Undersea Enthusiast.name: Undersea Enthusiast
Undersea Enthusiast.description:
Prerequisite Region - High Seas

You love diving and exploring the world beneath the waves, and long periods of swimming have trained you to move easily through the water. You're also fascinated by undersea creatures and cultures-and may even have a trace of one of them in your own lineage.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或体质，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Athletics skill and the Ocean Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iOY6YfGBaOvMNAor]{Underwater Marauder} skill feat.

Undertaker.name: 殡仪员 Undertaker
Undertaker.description:
人会死。这虽是生活的不幸真相，但你的事业正是建立在这一点上的，因为无论哪里有人死亡，就有殓葬服务的需求。你可能是一个法莱斯玛的牧师或者世俗的职业人士，但你的工作是照顾尸体，安慰失去亲人的人，确保死者以应有的尊严得到最终的回报。当然，在你这个位置上的人会看到很多奇怪的死亡，其中的一个让你踏上冒险之路。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在医疗和一项专门针对当地一种不死生物的学识技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Ws9JlysHcFoz6WAQ]{法医直觉 Forensic Acumen}技能专长。

Unsponsored.name: Unsponsored
Unsponsored.description:
You have aspirations of attending the Magaambya academy of magic, but fate seemed to thwart you at every turn. You were unable to obtain a sponsorship and lost a collection of helpful textbooks to unexpected insect damage. You nevertheless made the long trip to Nantambu through terrible weather, uncharacteristically bad roads, and indifferent fellow travelers. Yet you have persevered. Now that you are here, alone but determined, you won't let anything stand in your way.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是体质或魅力，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in your choice of the Diplomacy or Intimidation skill. You gain a skill feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KpFetnUqTiweypZk]{Group Impression} if you chose Diplomacy or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQMz6eDgX75WX2ce]{Intimidating Glare} if you chose Intimidation. You're also trained in Academia Lore.

Your recommended primary branch is the Tempest-Sun Mages.

Ustalavic Academic.name: Ustalavic Academic
Ustalavic Academic.description:
Prerequisite Region - Eye of Dread

You were educated at a famed Ustalavic academy, such as the University of Lepidstadt or the Sincomakti School of Sciences, and received quality instruction in advanced concepts of mathematics, science, and engineering.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Crafting skill and the Academia Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P6icK2DbRoZ3H6kc]{Skill Training} skill feat.

Varisian Wanderer.name: Varisian Wanderer
Varisian Wanderer.description:
Prerequisite Region - Saga Lands

You have spent your youth wandering the lands of Varisia and beyond among the brightly painted wagons of a Varisian caravan. You have heard endless tales of your people's history and lore, and have learned many songs and stories from the disparate people you have met.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Performance skill and the Circus Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7LB00jkh6JaJr3vS]{Fascinating Performance} skill feat.

Vidrian Reformer.name: Vidrian Reformer
Vidrian Reformer.description:
Prerequisite Region - Mwangi Expanse

You know that the only way your homeland of Vidrian can remain free from outside conquerors is by forging a strong and unified government. As such, you seek to bind your fellow citizens together through careful diplomacy and force of personality-or, if necessary, subterfuge and intrigue.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Diplomacy skill and the Politics Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{Hobnobber} skill feat.

Wandering Preacher.name: 流浪传教士 Wandering Preacher
Wandering Preacher.description:
你曾经在一个摇摇欲坠的教堂里对一小群信众布道，那些日子已经一去不复返了。你的教堂被摧毁，你的信众四散，现在你一手拿着一本破旧的宗教经文，一手带着坚定的信念，在大地上漫步。

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是体质或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在宗教和你所信仰神祇（如法莱斯玛）的学识技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BqceQIKE0lwIS98s]{朝圣者印记 Pilgrim's Token}技能专长。

Wanted Witness.name: Wanted Witness
Wanted Witness.description:
You saw something you shouldn't have, plain and simple. The shame is that you don't even know what it is, exactly, that you saw.

After moving to Alkenstar, you swiftly fell in love with the City of Smog, but you found it difficult to get a foothold in the fast-paced metropolis. Luckily, a chance invitation promised good work for someone with your unique social talents. You went to an inconspicuous chamber in a humble tower somewhere in the Capital District. There, you met some clearly powerful, clearly corrupt members of the Alkenstar elite. Among the faces you recognized were the notorious mogul Ambrost Mugland and the steely-eyed shieldmarshal Anjelique Loveless. Before you were asked to leave, you made quite an impression-but not a good one.

Not only did you not make the cut for whatever kinds of jobs were on offer that day, but you soon discovered that you couldn't get a room at any inn in the city, and there were wanted posters with your name on them plastered all over town. Friends and families turned their backs on you, afraid to get involved. Clearly, someone at that meeting-Mugland, maybe, or perhaps Loveless- believed you were a liability, and they had you excised from Alkenstar society. All you want is to be able to walk the streets without fearing for your life, and there's only one way to make that happen: find the villains responsible for your predicament and get them to undo the curse now attached to your name.

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是体质或魅力，另一项为自选属性加成。

You're trained in the Society skill and the Alkenstar Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.yUuU9xyotrpwpTyC]{Read Lips} skill feat.

Waste Walker.name: 废土行者 Waste Walker
Waste Walker.description:
无论你是在法力废土还是其他类似的荒无人烟的地方长大的，你很快就会明白只有强者才能生存。你和你的家人被迫躲避怪物、变种人、狂野魔法，更糟糕的是，每一天你都可能遇到从未见过的危险或威胁。你学会了如何适应最恶劣的环境，如何在很少有人敢生活的地方觅食和生存。

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是力量或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在生存和法力废土学识（ Mana Wastes Lore）技能上受训（如果你在其他类似的地方成长，则替换为另一个相似的学识）。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{觅食者 Forager}技能专长。

Whispering Way Scion.name: Whispering Way Scion
Whispering Way Scion.description:
Prerequisite Region - Eye of Dread

Your family has long been associated with the enigmatic death cult known as the Whispering Way, which was recently responsible for the terrible devastation in the nation of Lastwall. Whether or not you have followed in their footsteps, you know many of the philosophy's secrets.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Religion skill and the Undead Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x7EMZNMavris2aHY]{Student of the Canon} skill feat.

Wildwood Local.name: Wildwood Local
Wildwood Local.description:
Prerequisite Region - Shining Kingdoms

You might have been born and raised among the druids of the Verduran Forest, or you may have spent time among them as an adult and come to know their ways.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Nature skill as well as the Forest Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WC4xLBGmBsdOdHWu]{Natural Medicine} skill feat.

Willing Host.name: 志愿灵主 Willing Host
Willing Host.description:
你能和一些只有你感觉得到的灵魂交流：一缕缕迷失的灵魂，家族的保护者，先祖精魂，以及其他的实体。你可以与这些存在谈判，让他们降灵到你的身体里，以便传授你知识或给予你一些援助——以帮个小忙的代价。

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是Wisdom或魅力，另一项为自选属性加成。

你在灵魂学识（Spirit Lore skill）上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.yXk0G8l0leaqHh1U]{降灵 Host Spirit}动作。

Winter's Child.name: Winter's Child
Winter's Child.description:
Prerequisite Region - Saga Lands

Your or one of your ancestors hails from Irrisen, and some spark of the icy region's magic has manifested itself within your bones. The blood of Baba Yaga's legacy runs in your veins, and you are at one with the mysteries and dangers of the frozen land.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Arcana skill and the Weather Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.blMeVamjGz4ODWxq]{Arcane Sense} skill feat.

Wished Alive.name: 生命成真 Wished Alive
Wished Alive.description:
曾经你是一个简单的构装体或者无生命的玩偶，但是由于你或他人的强烈愿望，你活了过来，所以你现在是一个活生生的、会呼吸的生物。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在交涉技能上受训。每天一次，你可以用一个带有专注特征的单动作来进行热切的期盼某项事情可以成功。如果你这么做了，那么在回合结束前的第一次技能检定中获得+2环境加值以实现该愿望。

Witch Wary.name: Witch Wary
Witch Wary.description:
Prerequisite Region - Saga Lands

You have little love or trust for spellcraft and those who practice it, and have developed a paranoid knack for recognizing such tricks. You are constantly on guard for the magic of witches and have been trained to spot the signs of those with minds affected by magic.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Occultism skill and the Curse Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hDGosy2ZTwnyctEP]{Oddity Identification} skill feat.

Witchlight Follower.name: Witchlight Follower
Witchlight Follower.description:
While in a dismal forest or remote swamp, you caught sight of a string of lights bobbing through the trees. You stepped forward for a closer look, and then still further when the lights retreated a few paces. Then you remembered the rumors. Will-o'-wisps, rushlights, corpse lanterns—whatever they're called—such evil creatures lead people to their doom. With a supreme effort of will, you broke free from the alluring enchantment, and you've resolved to never let the strange lights of remote wildernesses claim you again.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in Survival and the Wisp Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4tTkRyOQ0VuRBac3]{Terrain Expertise} skill feat with both swamp terrain and subterranean bodies of water.

Wonder Taster.name: Wonder Taster
Wonder Taster.description:
Prerequisite Region - Broken Lands

Having once sampled Numerian fluids, you've tasted knowledge beyond comprehension. You are driven to recapture that astounding experience.

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或体质，另一项为自选属性提升。

You're trained in the Crafting skill and the Alchemical Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} skill feat.

Seer of the Dead.name: 亡者先知 Seer of the Dead
Seer of the Dead.description:
你很早就拥有了观察并与逝者交流的能力。这可能是在你出生时，或者是一次偶然意外将你与逝者的精魂联系在了一起。他们的反复出现可能让人觉得是一种诅咒，也可能为你带来受欢迎的陪伴。

你获得一项属性提升。它必须是体质或感知。

你在宗教和亡灵学识（Undead Lore）上受训。你在任何时候都获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3ehSrqTAm7IPqbIZ]{精魂感知 Spirit Sense}法术的效果。

Servant.name: 仆役 Servant
Servant.description:
你曾是一个侍奉贵族左右的仆从，作为家中心腹之一，获得他们的信任。你可能在一切顺利的情况下离开岗位，也可能是知道了一个关于你前主人的危险秘密。无论怎样，你都为了有所改变而开始冒险的生活，并发现对于自己新的角色，你从前学到的技能也能派上用场。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在生存技能和劳力（Labor）学识技能上受训。你获得技能专长：@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.yUuU9xyotrpwpTyC]{读唇 Read Lips}。

Squire.name: 侍从 Squire
Squire.description:
你跟在一名骑士身边接受训练，维护其装备，并在锦标赛和战斗中提供支援。现在，你寻找一个能证明你配得上正式骑士身份的挑战，或者你摒弃了华而不实的仪式，打算在虽然不太正式，但是堂堂正正的战斗中考验自己。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或体质，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在运动技能，以及纹章（Heraldry）或战争（Warfare）学识技能上受训。你获得技能专长：@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Lc4dJZivRwU3QEmT]{穿甲助手 Armor Assist}。

Acolyte.name: 侍祭 Acolyte
Acolyte.description:
你在一座宗教寺院或修道院中度过早年。你可能因为要传播你的宗教理念或是抛弃了信仰的教诲，从而出外云游四海，但在你的内心深处，将永远留下你曾学到的东西。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在宗教（Religion）技能和书吏（Scribing）学识技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x7EMZNMavris2aHY]{教典学徒 Student of the Canon}技能专长。

Detective.name: 侦探 Detective
Detective.description:
你以警务督察的身份解决案件，或是被富有的客户雇佣为私家侦探。成为冒险者或许是你要解决的下一个大谜团的一部分，但很可能是由于前一个案件带来的余波。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在社群（Society）技能和黑道（Underworld）学识技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.X2jGFfLU5qI5XVot]{人情练达 Streetwise}技能专长。

Tinker.name: 修补匠 Tinker
Tinker.description:
你制造五花八门的小发明来解决问题。你的工程技术别出心裁，没人知道你下一次会冒出来什么样的点子。它可能会是个具有巨大潜力的天才装置……也有可能爆炸。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是敏捷或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在手艺技能和工程（Engineering）学识技能上受训。你获得技能专长：@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{独门手艺 Specialty Crafting}。

False Medium.name: 假灵媒 False Medium
False Medium.description:
世界上有些人拥有能够穿透生死界限，与灵魂交流的能力。你……并不是其中之一。但你对神秘学，冷读术和地方宗教的各种行为了解的足够多，让你可以用这些手段骗取人民的钱财。你的骗局背后有一些真正的神秘方法，不像一个彻头彻尾的骗子，但这对被你欺骗的人来说可能是一种冰冷的安慰。无论你是决定走上更加正义的道路，还是被抓住并承诺要正确行事，抑或是在冒险间仍有几次"体验"，当你行走各地时，你已经习惯了这种冒险生活。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在神秘和占卜学识（Fortune-Telling Lore）上受训。

你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.r7cgrrHh75R8UEqN]{信仰欺诈 Deceptive Worship}（Deceptive Worship）技能专长。

Ward.name: 养子 Ward
Ward.description:
在你年幼时，另一个家庭成了你的监护人。这家人供你吃住，教育，但从未完全把你当成家庭的一份子。也许你不得不满足他们的条件，以换取他们对你的照料，也许你虽得到抚养但却被忽视。现在，冒险是你成长和自由遨游的机会。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在表演技能和世家（Genealogy）学识技能上受训。你获得技能专长：@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7LB00jkh6JaJr3vS]{迷魂表演 Fascinating Performance}。

Farmhand.name: 农民 Farmhand
Farmhand.description:
凭着虎背熊腰和对季节轮替的理解，你耕种土地，照料庄稼。你的农场可能已被入侵者摧毁，或者你已失去了将你留在农地里的家庭，又或者，你仅仅是厌倦了这份繁重无聊的活计。无论如何，你在某个时刻成了一名冒险者。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在运动（Athletics）技能和农务（Farming）学识技能上受训。你获得针对运动技能的@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{驾轻就熟 Assurance}技能专长。

Animal Whisperer.name: 动物知音 Animal Whisperer
Animal Whisperer.description:
你总是能感觉到与动物之间的关联，而学会驯服它们更是轻而易举。在旅行时，你总能遇到不同的生物，并且跟它们结交。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是感知或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在自然（Nature）技能和一项与你喜爱的动物居住地形相关的学识技能（比如平原Plains或沼泽Swamp）上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nowEaHgIyij7im8F]{训练动物 Train Animal}技能专长。

Laborer.name: 劳工 Laborer
Laborer.description:
你干过多年的苦力活。那是段艰辛的日子，但你终究捱了过来。你可能把冒险当成一种更容易出人头地的途径，或是奉他人的命令冒险。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或体质，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在运动技能和劳力（Labor）学识技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.C0Tcelg3BAPhML6J]{力大无穷 Hefty Hauler}技能专长。

Fortune Teller.name: 占卜师 Fortune Teller
Fortune Teller.description:
你明了命运千丝万缕的缠结，学会了许多能让凡人预知未来的传统方式。你可能曾用这些技艺来引领你的同胞，或是只将其用于牟利。不过，哪怕是最浅尝辄止的实践，也会将你与宇宙的玄妙奥秘联系起来。

选择两项属性加成。一项必须是智力或魅力，另一项为自选属性加成。

你在神秘（Occultism）技能和占卜（Fortune-Telling）学识技能上受训。你获得技能专长： @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hDGosy2ZTwnyctEP]{辨别异象 Oddity Identification}。

Astrologer.name: 占星家 Astrologer
Astrologer.description:
占星家寻找星体的迹象与预兆，用它们的位置来为生活在它们下面的人们指明方向。随着天体的移动，命运也在移动。你研究星星并学会了根据它们的指引来预测自己的道路。无论是星星直接呼唤你进入冒险生活，还是你用星星来引导自己的旅行，你都是在冒险生活中接受星星的指引。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在神秘和占星学识（Astrology Lore）学识上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hDGosy2ZTwnyctEP]{辨别异象 Oddity Identification}技能专长。

Guard.name: 卫兵 Guard
Guard.description:
出于爱国精神或是对报酬的需要，你曾任职卫兵。无论哪种情况，你都知道如何让一个顽固的嫌疑人开口。即便你离开了岗位，可能也会将冒险视为一个能让你施展才能的更广阔的舞台。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在威吓（Intimidation）技能和法律或战争学识技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ar2DUlvDK4LDcH9J]{迅速胁迫 Quick Coercion}技能专长。

Cook.name: 厨师 Cook
Cook.description:
你是在酒馆或其他餐饮场所的厨房里长大的，并在那里表现出色，成为一名出色的厨师。烘烤、烹饪、兼营一点酿酒——你已经默默无闻地忙碌了很久，是时候到外面的世界去欣赏风光了。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或智力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在生存技能和烹饪（Cooking）学识技能上受训。你获得技能专长：@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Eceqc6zbMj2x0q9]{调制老手 Seasoned}。

Anti-Magical.name: 反魔法体质 Anti-Magical
Anti-Magical.description:
在你身边，魔法从来都不太管用。也许你已经成为了一个魔法使用者，或者也许你用你独特的能力来对付魔法使用者。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在自己选择的学识技能上受训，但它不可能是与魔法相关的（如果不清楚，由GM决定）。每当你受到魔法影响时，即使是你自己的魔法或盟友的魔法，效果的制造者必须尝试@Check[type:flat|dc:3]检定。

若失败，魔法不会影响你（仍会对其他人产生正常的影响）。成功后，魔法会影响你，也无需再尝试相同魔法效果的纯骰检定，即使以后再次影响你。

Cursed.name: 受诅者 CursedCursed
Cursed.description:
你是个人或祖传诅咒的受害者。通过不懈努力和对神秘学的研究，你已经学会了抵御诅咒最糟糕的效果，进而保护自己免受其他有害魔法的伤害。然而，诅咒仍然纠缠着你，有时会以危险的方式显现出来。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在神秘技能和诅咒（Curse）学识上受训。你获得反应动作：@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7pdG8l9POMK76Lf2]{守护印记 Warding Sign}。你应该和GM决定诅咒的完整效果，不过你现在已经能够规避其中的大多数效果。由GM决定你身上残余的诅咒影响，这通常包含至少一个永久或非常频繁的主题效果，以及偶尔出现的更加危险的效果。

Chosen One.name: 受选者 Chosen One
Chosen One.description:
你伴随预言出生，你身边的人都认为你将完成伟大的事业。你承受着巨大压力去完成这项任务，而预言的易变性使你的前途难卜。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

与你的GM一起决定你要完成的预言的主要部分。你在一项与预言有关的技能和占卜学识（Fortune-Telling Lore）上受训。你获得了@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.vdnuczo4ktS7ow7N]{预言之卒 Prophecy's Pawn}自由动作。

注意：你需要手动选择技能，并将@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.vdnuczo4ktS7ow7N]{预言之卒 Prophecy's Pawn}添加到人物卡中。

Merchant.name: 商人 Merchant
Merchant.description:
你曾在尘土飞扬的商店、市场摊位或商队篷车中出售货物，换取金钱和商品。你所掌握的技能仍然适用于冒险生活，比如用好价钱买的一套盔甲就有可能救你一命。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在交涉技能和商业（Mercantile）学识技能上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5nc5ridFBfYpn2Om]{慧眼识珠 Bargain Hunter}技能专长。

Prisoner.name: 囚犯 Prisoner
Prisoner.description:
你可能曾因犯罪（无论是否无辜）而被囚禁，或是在成长过程中曾被奴役过。在你的冒险生涯中，你会充分利用你刚刚收获的自由。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是力量或体质，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在隐匿技能和黑道学识技能上受训。你获得技能专长：@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.t3btih0O5RUwWynt]{老练走私者 Experienced Smuggler}。

Returned.name: 复生者 Returned
Returned.description:
你曾经死亡过，然后奇迹般地复活了，带着死后国度的知识，并与生命有了更强的联系。一些已死或不死的灵魂可能会对你产生一股出于本能的奇异亲切感。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是体质或感知，另一项为自选属性提升。

你获得专长：@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.I0BhPWqYf1bbzEYg]{顽强 Diehard}，以及对于白骨墓园（Boneyard）学识的专长：@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{额外学识 Additional Lore}。

Out-Of-Towner.name: 外乡人 Out-Of-Towner
Out-Of-Towner.description:
你从未来过布雷克屯（Breachill），这镇子里也没亲戚，但机缘巧合下你拜访了这里。你可能是与一位朋友来这里旅行、来拜访老熟人、或者仅仅是为了探索这世界上还未踏足过的土地。在来到这个镇子之前，你与其他族裔的人们生活过数年时间，见识过各色事物的童年赋予了你开放的思维和好奇的天性。

接触到未曾见过的民族和文化让你兴奋，回应英雄征召（Call for Heroes）活动似乎是一种了解他们的有趣方式。

选择两项属性提升（ability boost）。其中一项必须为 体质 或 智力，另一项则为自由属性提升（ability boost）。

你的交涉（Diplomacy）技能以及在你成长过程中一同生活的那个族裔相关的学识的熟练度为受训：矮人（Dwarf）、精灵（Elf）、侏儒（Gnome）、地精（Goblin）或半身人（Halfling）。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{飞短流长 Hobnobber} 技能专长。

Amnesiac.name: 失忆症 Amnesiac
Amnesiac.description:
你的背景是……好吧……其实你不记得了！可能在你心灵深处有一些线索，暗藏着异常的情绪或对某些人或状况的意外反应，但你最后还是无法知道自己曾经的身份。你的冒险可能就是专门让你寻找自己的秘密的，这取决于你和GM如何处理你的角色背景的真相。你可以把它交给GM决定，使它成为一个秘密，也可以跟GM合作创作，甚至可以选择把它留到以后再决定。无论哪种情况，你和GM应该确定少量关于你的角色及其物品的重要细节，从而取得关于你的过去的第一批线索。

你获得三项自选属性提升。其中两项由你选择，第三项则根据暗示了角色可能的经历的第一批线索，由GM进行选择。

Academy Dropout.name: 学院辍学生 Academy Dropout
Academy Dropout.description:
你曾被一所著名的魔法学院录取，但后来你辍学了。也许发生了重大事件，也许你不得不承担起其他责任，也许这对你来说太过分了。不管是什么，你从学院的退学和你的入学一样塑造并引导你走向冒险的生活。

选择两项属性提升。一项必须是智力或魅力，另一项为自选属性提升。

你在奥法和学术学识（Academia Lore）上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{可疑知识 Dubious Knowledge}技能专长。

Artisan.name: 工匠 Artisan
Artisan.description:
